title: Looking for other girls to play casually with
body:
My friend wants some other grills to play with because she is sick of playing with all guys.. She wasn't sure about putting a post up cause she is a bit shy..
 rank is not an issue we just like hanging out as friends.
Add me or "Sel" if you are interested in meeting some fun people to play with. Do not be shy we are very friendly and welcome everyone!

replies.body: Hey Guys xoxox, im not a girl, but id love to come along and play! :) im a really funny guy and i love to play league of dota: global offensive! :D{{champion:103}}
Hello im a girl, unfortunatly i was born with a dick tho, can i still play with you?
